DOC.brief_summary: The safety , tolerability , pharmacokinetics nalmefene single oral dose 10 mg healthy Japanese male subject evaluate .
DOC.brief_title: A Single-center , Open-label , Single-dose Study Investigating Safety , Tolerability , Pharmacokinetic Properties Nalmefene 10 mg Tablets Healthy Japanese Male Subjects
DOC.criteria: The subject Japanese male . The subject able read understand inform consent form ( ICF ) . The subject body mass index ( BMI ) ≥ 19 kg/m2 ≤ 25 kg/m2 screen visit . The subject resting pulse heart rate ( read ECG ) ≥ 45 bpm ≤ 100 bpm screen visit . The subject take prescription drug , overthe counter medication , vitamin supplement , supplement contain St. John 's Wort ( Hypericum perforatum ) within 2 week prior Day 1 . The subject significant history alcohol abuse , define alcohol intake great 21 unit per week . ( A unit alcohol define 250 mL lager/beer , 100 mL wine , 25 mL spirit . ) The subject take investigational product within 4 month prior Day 1 .
